creator: pedrum@tacitussystems.com
text:
Comments are not ignored when they are included within the jsp:include tag. 
This bug applies to versions 3.1.1 and 3.2.1 of Tomcat.

This works.

<!-- #BeginEditable "MenuSelect"  -->
<jsp:include page="menubar.jsp" flush="true">
<jsp:param name="activeMenu" value="Wizard"/>  
</jsp:include>
<!-- #EndEditable -->

This doesn't.

<jsp:include page="menubar.jsp" flush="true">
<!-- #BeginEditable "MenuSelect"  -->
<jsp:param name="activeMenu" value="Wizard"/>  
<!-- #EndEditable -->
</jsp:include>

Here is the stack trace.
